Pekan.title: Pekan
Pekan.byline: Pekan is the royal town of the state of Pahang, Malaysia, and an interesting place to visit.

Pekanbaru.title: Pekanbaru
Pekanbaru.byline: Pekanbaru is the capital of Riau province in Indonesia.

Pekalongan (city).title: Pekalongan (city)
Pekalongan (city).byline: Pekalongan is a city on the north coast of Central Java.

Pekan Nanas.title: Pekan Nanas
Pekan Nanas.byline: Pekan Nanas is a town in Pontian District, Johor, Malaysia.
